Text:
Thanks bigbluesea for this enomous yet very very very good book on the subject. I'd actually never seen or heard of this book before but its the best i think.
One challenge though, can you pliz upload "Fundamentals of Motor Vehicle Technology" by Hillier {The complete book other than the split versions 1,2 & 3} Thanks a bunch in advance and ever so for this one.
No way you uploaded this whole thing!! I bought the 3rd edition right before this one came out. Its actually a damn good textbook on the subject. Keep up the awesome work! I will seed indefinetely
